TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComment implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Org.W3c.Dom.ICharacterData, class Org.W3c.Dom.INode, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: This interface inherits from CharacterData and represents the content of a comment, i.e., all the characters between the starting ' <!--' and ending '-->'.
